package.name: Net_Socket
package.description: Net_Socket is a class interface to TCP sockets. It provides blocking and non-blocking operation, with different reading and writing modes (byte-wise, block-wise, line-wise and special formats like network byte-order ip addresses).
package.notes: - IPv6 sockets cannot be used (Bug #18231) - Socket.php errors when sending large emails through Pear Mail (Bug #18281) - 2nd argument of setTimeout() could be optional (Bug #18436) - Setting timeout after connect() doesn't work correctly (Bug #18437) - Wrong PHP version dependency and socket_* function aliases (Bug #18438) - Incomplete gets() method description (Bug #19557)

release.notes: QA release - Configurable newline sequence (PEAR Bug #14181) - Make $size parameter to gets() optional (PEAR Bug #14433) - Don't overwrite $errstr set by fsockopen (PEAR Bug #14448) - Avoid an infinite loop if fwrite() returns 0 (PEAR Bug #14619) - CS cleanup (PEAR Bug #14803)
